title: Reacting to the Hawks Coaching Change, and No Power Rankings | Group Chat
description:
Justin, Tjarks, and Rob discuss the Hawks firing Lloyd Pierce and installing Nate McMillan as interim head coach (01:00). Later, they debate their No Power Rankings, breaking down some of the most bleak franchises in the league this season (20:00).
Hosts: Justin Verrier, Jonathan Tjarks, and Rob Mahoney
